heading: The future of travel, on the traditions of the past
text:
One of our missions is to preserve and introduce to the world the glory of the Indonesian maritime history.
 The MAJ Oceanic is hand built and handcrafted in Bira, Sulawesi based on the heritage of ancestral knowledge.

card_three_image.caption: the cabins
card_three_image.heading: Be inspired by the ancient seamen
